org.jlab.coda.hipo

Class Compressor

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jlab.coda.hipo.Compressor

  • public class Compressor
extends java.lang.Object
    Singleton class used to provide data compression and decompression in a variety of formats.
    Author:
    gavalian, timmer

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Compressor.ByteBufferBackedInputStream
      Use this class when decompressing GZIP data from a ByteBuffer.

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static Compressor getInstance()
        Get the single instance of this class.
        Returns:
        single instance of this class.

      • getMaxCompressedLength

        public static int getMaxCompressedLength(CompressionType compressionType,
                                         int uncompressedLength)
        Returns the maximum number of bytes needed to compress the given length of uncompressed data. Depends on compression type. Unknown for gzip.
        Parameters:
        compressionType - type of data compression to do (0=none, 1=lz4 fast, 2=lz4 best, 3=gzip). Default to none.
        uncompressedLength - uncompressed data length in bytes.
        Returns:
        maximum compressed length in bytes or -1 if unknown.

      • getCompressedBuffer

        public static byte[] getCompressedBuffer(CompressionType compressionType,
                                         byte[] buffer)
        Returns compressed buffer. Depends on compression type.
        Parameters:
        compressionType - type of data compression to do (0=none, 1=lz4 fast, 2=lz4 best, 3=gzip). Default to none.
        buffer - uncompressed buffer.
        Returns:
        compressed buffer.

      • getUnCompressedBuffer

        public static byte[] getUnCompressedBuffer(CompressionType compressionType,
                                           byte[] compressedBuffer)
                                    throws net.jpountz.lz4.LZ4Exception
        Returns uncompressed buffer. Depends on compression type.
        Parameters:
        compressionType - type of data compression to undo (0=none, 1=lz4 fast, 2=lz4 best, 3=gzip). Default to none.
        compressedBuffer - uncompressed array.
        Returns:
        uncompressed array.
        Throws:
        net.jpountz.lz4.LZ4Exception - if not enough room in allocated array (3x compressed) to hold LZ4 uncompressed data.

      • compressGZIP

        public static byte[] compressGZIP(byte[] ungzipped)
        GZIP compression. Returns compressed byte array.
        Parameters:
        ungzipped - uncompressed data.
        Returns:
        compressed data.

                                  int offset,
                                  int length)
        GZIP compression. Returns compressed byte array.
        Parameters:
        ungzipped - uncompressed data.
        offset - offset into ungzipped array
        length - length of valid data in bytes
        Returns:
        compressed data.

        Returns:
        uncompressed data.

      • uncompressGZIP

                                    int off,
                                    int length)
        GZIP decompression. Returns uncompressed byte array.
        Parameters:
        gzipped - compressed data.
        off - offset into gzipped array.
        length - max number of bytes to read from gzipped.
        Returns:
        uncompressed data.

        Returns:

      • compressLZ4

        public static int compressLZ4(java.nio.ByteBuffer src,
                              int srcSize,
                              java.nio.ByteBuffer dst,
                              int maxSize)
                       throws HipoException
        Fastest LZ4 compression. Returns length of compressed data in bytes.
        Parameters:
        src - source of uncompressed data.
        srcSize - number of bytes to compress.
        dst - destination buffer.
        maxSize - maximum number of bytes to write in dst.
        Returns:
        length of compressed data in bytes.
        Throws:
        HipoException - if maxSize < max # of compressed bytes

      • compressLZ4

        public static int compressLZ4(byte[] src,
                              int srcOff,
                              int srcSize,
                              byte[] dst,
                              int dstOff,
                              int maxSize)
                       throws HipoException
        Fastest LZ4 compression. Returns length of compressed data in bytes.
        Parameters:
        src - source of uncompressed data.
        srcOff - start offset in src.
        srcSize - number of bytes to compress.
        dst - destination array.
        dstOff - start offset in dst.
        maxSize - maximum number of bytes to write in dst.
        Returns:
        length of compressed data in bytes.
        Throws:
        HipoException - if maxSize < max # of compressed bytes

      • uncompressLZ4

        public static int uncompressLZ4(java.nio.ByteBuffer src,
                                int srcSize,
                                java.nio.ByteBuffer dst)
                         throws HipoException
        LZ4 decompression. Returns original length of decompressed data in bytes.
        Parameters:
        src - source of compressed data.
        srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
        dst - destination array.
        Returns:
        original (uncompressed) input size.
        Throws:
        HipoException - if dst is too small to hold uncompressed data

      • uncompressLZ4

        public static int uncompressLZ4(java.nio.ByteBuffer src,
                                int srcOff,
                                int srcSize,
                                java.nio.ByteBuffer dst)
                         throws HipoException
        LZ4 decompression. Returns original length of decompressed data in bytes.
        Parameters:
        src - source of compressed data.
        srcOff - start offset in src.
        srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
        dst - destination array.
        Returns:
        original (uncompressed) input size.
        Throws:
        HipoException - if dst is too small to hold uncompressed data

      • uncompressLZ4

        public static int uncompressLZ4(byte[] src,
                                int srcOff,
                                int srcSize,
                                byte[] dst,
                                int dstOff)
                         throws HipoException
        LZ4 decompression. Returns original length of decompressed data in bytes.
        Parameters:
        src - source of compressed data.
        srcOff - start offset in src.
        srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
        dst - destination array.
        dstOff - start offset in dst.
        Returns:
        original (uncompressed) input size.
        Throws:
        HipoException - if (dst.length - dstOff) is too small to hold uncompressed data

      • uncompressLZ4

        public static byte[] uncompressLZ4(byte[] src,
                                   int srcOff,
                                   int srcSize,
                                   int maxDestLen)
        LZ4 decompression. Returns an array containing the original decompressed data in bytes.
        Parameters:
        src - source of compressed data.
        srcOff - start offset in src.
        srcSize - number of compressed bytes.
        maxDestLen - max available bytes to hold uncompressed data.
        Returns:
        original, uncompressed data. Length of array is length of valid data.
